items.title: Deal of the day: Fly to South America from 12,000 points or miles
items.description: You can currently book flights to Colombia and Peru from only 12,000 points or miles.

items.title: Frontier Airlines announces CEO Barry Biffle's sudden departure
items.description: Frontier Airlines CEO Barry Biffle will step down immediately, while airline president James Dempsey will be appointed interim CEO.

items.title: Why the end of the year is the perfect time to open a premium credit card
items.description: The end of the year can be a great time to open a new premium rewards credit card. Here are four reasons why.
